word_mean: 虫，体外寄生虫：动物外寄生虫的总称

sentence.Network_en: On farms the fox is considered vermin and treated as such.
sentence.Network_cn: 在农场里狐狸被当成有害动物来对待。
农夫把狐狸看成是祸害.

sentence.Network_en: Foxes were traditionally regarded as vermin.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们传统上都认为狐狸是有害的动物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: v字仇杀队那段都是V的经典台词 ... ) virulent - 恶毒的 ) vermin - 害虫 ) vanguarding - 先驱的，以...为首的.
集体名词_百度百科 ... My family are all workers. 我的家人都是工人。 vermin（ 害虫，寄生虫） clergy（ 牧师，神职人员）.
电影屋_新浪博客 ... bygone 过去的事 vermin 害虫；寄生虫；歹徒 vouchsafe 允诺；赐予.
考博英语词汇 ... verify v. 证实；证明 vermin n. 害虫；寄生虫；害兽；害鸟 versatile a. 多方面的：多才多艺的；万用的，.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally denoting animals such as reptiles and snakes): from Old French, based on Latin vermis 'worm'

entry.tran: （对人类）有害的动物;害兽;害虫
entry.def: Vermin are small animals such as rats and mice which cause problems to humans by carrying disease and damaging crops or food.

example.ex: From 1066 to the 17th century the fox was looked upon as vermin.
example.tran: 从1066年到17世纪，狐狸一直被视为害兽。

means.word_mean: 2. any of various small animals or insects that are pests; e.g. cockroaches or rats

auth_sentence.content: They treat the poor as a type of vermin.

sentences.cn: 农夫把狐狸看成是祸害。

sentences.en: Foxes were traditionally regarded as vermin.
sentences.cn: 人们传统上都认为狐狸是有害的动物。

sentences.en: Some communicable diseases are transmitted only through the agency of vermin or insects.
sentences.cn: 某些传染病只通过害虫和昆虫来传播。
